subj-group.subject: Property Taxes: Support for, Relief From, and Collapse

title-group.article-title: Use Value Assessment of Rural Land in the United States

abstract.p: This paper was prepared for presentation at the annual meetings of the National Tax Association, in the session, “Property Taxes: Support for, Relief from, and Collapse,” Santa Fe, NM, November 15, 2014. This paper draws substantially from Anderson and England (2014). Support for this research was provided by the Lincoln Institute of Land Policy, Cambridge, MA.
